name: Dashkin
description:
A game of super-speed, side-scrolling challenges featuring Bitey, the last of the Dashkin™. Capable of extraordinary speed, Bitey hones his reflexes with over 120 individual challenges including collection speedruns, speed control and "BrackenSack", the ancient, brawling ballgame of his people. A mysterious flying girl lures him through these challenges with clues to his past and visions of his people, ranking his progress and training him for a battle to save the world of Brackenwood from an impending invasion.

Play the BrackenSack ballgame online against other Dashkin players

  • Singleplayer
    • Hone your skills in over a hundred challenges, matches and collection speedruns.
    • Challenge categories include Training, Movement, Control, Solo and Team
    • Train against conjured apparitions called Shadowkin (AI bots)

  • Multiplayer - play the Dashkin ballgame of BrackenSack against other Dashkin, invite people to join your party, chat in game and track your progress through personal stats and global leaderboards.
    • Play on our dedicated servers located around the world.
    • Set up your own private server with the Dashkin™ Dedicated Server Application.
    • Matchmaking: queue online for 1v1, 2v2, and 3v3 games.
    • Parties: gather your friends and queue for a match
    • Chat: Party, Team, Game and Direct messaging
    • Separate offline and online rankings to track your progress and build your skill.

Dashkin is based on the popular Newgrounds animated series "Brackenwood" by Adam Phillips, aka chluaid.
